blogPost.excerpt:
Skeppy Trolls BadBoyHalo In A Very Super Epic Building Competition

Today BadBoyHalo and I are playing Minecraft... but we are professional builders. Each of us have our own side and we are competing against each other to build the most epic builds. The only thing that Bad doesn't know is that I may or may not have a cheating, unfair advantage over him with ONE WAY GLASS and a Link Command. We build things like houses, fountains, boats and all sorts of stuff - and the mod I had made it sooo much better hahahaha. I had to be so careful because I didn't want Bad to catch on too fast to the trolling, but oh my gosh it was so funny. He really thought the server was lagging LMAO. As usual this was SO fun to record with my best friend Bad so if you enjoyed this video and would like to see more build battles between us please be sure to like this video :) 

Also maybe... possibly... sub to @BadBoyHalo 
Also also, shoutout to @InstaAE for coming up with this video idea! (And editing the video of course)

Follow My Twitter - @Skeppy
Follow My Instagram - @Skeppy
  
Not Minecraft, But Water Rises or Minecraft, But Lava Rises, or any other but challenge like that. This is a speed run / speed runner of me trolling BadBoyHalo at building LMAO
blogPost.body:
Skeppy Trolls BadBoyHalo In A Very Super Epic Building Competition

Today BadBoyHalo and I are playing Minecraft... but we are professional builders. Each of us have our own side and we are competing against each other to build the most epic builds. The only thing that Bad doesn't know is that I may or may not have a cheating, unfair advantage over him with ONE WAY GLASS and a Link Command. We build things like houses, fountains, boats and all sorts of stuff - and the mod I had made it sooo much better hahahaha. I had to be so careful because I didn't want Bad to catch on too fast to the trolling, but oh my gosh it was so funny. He really thought the server was lagging LMAO. As usual this was SO fun to record with my best friend Bad so if you enjoyed this video and would like to see more build battles between us please be sure to like this video :) 

Also maybe... possibly... sub to @BadBoyHalo 
Also also, shoutout to @InstaAE for coming up with this video idea! (And editing the video of course)

Follow My Twitter - @Skeppy
Follow My Instagram - @Skeppy
  
Not Minecraft, But Water Rises or Minecraft, But Lava Rises, or any other but challenge like that. This is a speed run / speed runner of me trolling BadBoyHalo at building LMAO
blogPost.title: I Troll BadBoyHalo with ONE WAY GLASS in a Building Competition...
blogPost.author: Skeppy

localize.title: 我在建筑大赛中用ONE WAY GLASS吐槽BadBoyHalo...。
localize.description:
Skeppy Trolls BadBoyHalo在一个非常超级的史诗建筑竞赛中

今天BadBoyHalo和我在玩Minecraft......但我们是专业的建造者。我们每个人都有自己的一方，我们互相竞争，建立最史诗的构建。Bad 唯一不知道的是，我可能会或可能不会有一个作弊，不公平的优势，比他与ONE WAY GLASS和链接命令。我们建造的东西，比如房子、喷泉、船和各种东西--我的mod让它变得更好，哈哈哈哈。我不得不小心翼翼，因为我不想让Bad太快被钓到，但哦，我的天哪，这太有趣了。他真的以为服务器是滞后的LMAO。和往常一样，这是和我最好的朋友Bad一起录制的，非常有趣，所以如果你喜欢这段视频，并且想看到我们之间更多的建造战斗，请一定要喜欢这段视频:) 

此外，也许......可能......分到@BadBoyHalo。
同时，也要向@InstaAE致敬，感谢他提出了这个视频创意! (当然还有编辑视频)

关注我的微博 - @Skeppy
关注我的Instagram - @Skeppy
  
Not Minecraft, But Water Rises or Minecraft, But Lava Rises, or any other but challenge like that. 这是一个速度运行/速度运行的我在建设LMAO trolling BadBoyHalo的速度运行。

localize.title: 我在建築大賽中用ONE WAY GLASS吐槽BadBoyHalo...。
localize.description:
Skeppy Trolls BadBoyHalo在一個非常超級的史詩建築競賽中

今天BadBoyHalo和我在玩Minecraft......但我們是專業的建造者。我們每個人都有自己的一方，我們互相競爭，建立最史詩的構建。Bad 唯一不知道的是，我可能會或可能不會有一個作弊，不公平的優勢，比他與ONE WAY GLASS和鏈接命令。我們建造的東西，比如房子、噴泉、船和各種東西--我的mod讓它變得更好，哈哈哈哈。我不得不小心翼翼，因爲我不想讓Bad太快被釣到，但哦，我的天哪，這太有趣了。他真的以爲服務器是滯後的LMAO。和往常一樣，這是和我最好的朋友Bad一起錄製的，非常有趣，所以如果你喜歡這段視頻，並且想看到我們之間更多的建造戰鬥，請一定要喜歡這段視頻:) 

此外，也許......可能......分到@BadBoyHalo。
同時，也要向@InstaAE致敬，感謝他提出了這個視頻創意! (當然還有編輯視頻)

關注我的微博 - @Skeppy
關注我的Instagram - @Skeppy
  
Not Minecraft, But Water Rises or Minecraft, But Lava Rises, or any other but challenge like that. 這是一個速度運行/速度運行的我在建設LMAO trolling BadBoyHalo的速度運行。
